Title: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls
Writer: Meghan McCarthy, Lauren Faust (television series: "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic")
Actors: Tara Strong, Ashleigh Ball, Andrea Libman, Tabitha St. Germain
Plot: Via a magic mirror, Twilight Sparkle travels into an alternate universe in order to recover a crown that was stolen from the Crystal Empire. Upon her arrival she is horrified to learn that she has turned into a human.
